imdb.plot outline: On January 1, 2014 the Italian firm Fiat announced the total acquisition of Chrysler, establishing Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) as the seventh leader manufacturer of the automotive industry. American Chrysler arrived in 1938 to Mexico under the name of Automex and gained popularity on the Mexican streets and on the tracks with its Valiant Acapulco and Dodge Coronel among other models. On the other hand, Fiat one of the most successful European car manufacturers had been in Mexico for a brief period in the 1950s and returned with all its drive by 2004. Today FCA, the heir of these two great legacies, is becoming the new trend in automotive tradition.
imdb.title: Fiat Chrysler de México: historia de una nueva tradición
akas: Fiat Chrysler de México: historia de una nueva tradición (Mexico)
plot: On January 1, 2014 the Italian firm Fiat announced the total acquisition of Chrysler, establishing Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) as the seventh leader manufacturer of the automotive industry. On the other hand, Fiat one of the most successful European car manufacturers had been in Mexico for a brief period in the 1950s and returned with all its drive by 2004. Today FCA, the heir of these two great legacies, is becoming the new trend in automotive tradition.::Clío TV
